name: Revolution of Shadows
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
In a 30 foot area centered on a target point you can see, every creature you choose within that area has their shadow rise up to stab them in the back. They must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 5d6 piercing damage, halved on a success.

A creature reduced to 0 or fewer hit points from this spell is overtaken by their shadow instead. For 1 minute, they are reanimated and become a puppet under your control, able to either move or make one weapon attack during their turn, but not both.
